welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zonhoven – a charming city known for its beautiful green spaces and rich history. Take in the sights, sounds, and flavors of our city and immerse yourself in its unique culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo shipments at Kempen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
